[code]public void l33thax(int id)

outStream.writeByte(0);
outStream.writeWord(id);
flushOutStream();
}[/code]

item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

add this in your process boolean

		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698); {
		l33thax(7574); //dds
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305); {
		l33thax(7599); //d long
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377); {
		l33thax(7499); //d baxe
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5730); {
		l33thax(7674); //d spear
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204); {
		l33thax(8493); //d hally
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151); {
		l33thax(12323); //whip
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861); {
		l33thax(7549); //magic short
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434); {
		l33thax(7624); //d mace
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7158); {
